app/listener_name.description: Sets the name of the load balance pool on frontends. Application severs will join this load balance pool by using this name.  Ex: www

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

RightScale Application Server Manager Chef Resource (BETA) 

Provides a lightweight resource to manage your application servers across multiple cloud VMs. 


= REQUIREMENTS:

       
= USAGE
name: app
description: Common utilities for RightScale managed application servers
